website_summaries.verdict: Non-slip strips keep this organizer from slipping and sliding with every sharp turn you take.
pros: Reinforced base plate keeps sidewalls from collapsing in
Non-slip strips keep organizer in place
Compartments in multiple sizes and side storage pockets
Good for organizing cleaning supplies, kid gear or survival supplies
cons: May arrive with a strong odor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is nice quality! Used this to make a roadside emergency kit for our delivery drivers while they travel on remote New England Mountain roads. Plenty of room for a full emergency survival kit. It was able to fit: A small survival sleeping bag a good flashlight LED road flares a collapsible survival shovel a 30ft 4.5 ton towing cable with hooks on both ends a box of chemical hand/foot warmers headlamp tire chains dried long shelf life snack foods
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeUser1313

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer, excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome organizer. Sturdy, lots of exterior pockets. Options for the interior pocket layout. I use it in the bed of my truck under my tonneau cover. The original organizer I received had one of the Velcro pieces sewed on the wrong side and I didn’t receive a waterproof cover. I emailed the company and got a quick response. They were happy to send me out a new organizer and informed me that they weren’t including the waterproof cover because people didn’t seem to use it / be pleased with it. She went out of her way to search for a waterproof cover for me and send with the new organizer. Excellent organizer, wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: CJBenz

customer_reviews.title: It seems fairly sturdy and has very useful pockets
customer_reviews.text: It seems fairly sturdy and has very useful pockets, however, the plastic reeks of dog poop. Not kidding. I have left it out in the sun for a day, hosed it down, no matter what I do, the horrible smell permeates my car and everything that I place inside the organizer. Unfortunately it is past the return date, otherwise I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these back on 07-13-17, They do ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these back on 07-13-17, They do leak even with patches on the seams, they had and still emit this toxic smell that is overwhelming. I tried using them inside the back of the car but the fumes overcome everyone inside. These are made in China and I have a feeling that they are toxic as well. Don't buy even if is cheap, your lungs will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: JJF

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof! One leaky item and you must throw it away!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine until soap bottle leaked. Bottom inserts and bottom half of side panels became completely soaked with soap. No way to clean or reuse. Had to throw organizer away. Don't place anything containing liquids in side! You won't know about the leak until it's too late because it absorbs all the liquid. UPDATE: Seller contacted us and offered to replace the organizer. We accepted and appreciate their service. However this doesn't change our opinion of the product and we'll just have to be very cautious about storing anything with liquids.
customer_reviews.author: niwashikun

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: First off, Fortem offered to replace it. So I give them props for that. However this thing as others have posted, smells like poop. Also it is not a two tone grey and back. It is just black. Forte concedes that "some" of the items smell like poop and are trying to figure it out. However you would have to be blind to not notice the fact that it is all black. I am very very disappointed with this product. Thank goodness for Prime.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: What the heck did I do with my trunk before I had this?
customer_reviews.text: I love my FORTEM box, and I haven't even used it to its full potential yet. I put all of my loose junk in it and it's barely half full. There are little lid thingies that fit over the top of each of the compartments. They're flimsy and not very strong and they just kind of rest on top of whatever is in each compartment, so don't put heavy stuff on top of them if they're covering something fragile. However, I don't carry fragile stuff in my car, so I'm not too worried about it. I have it in the back of our 2008 Honda CR-V and it takes up less than half of the trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Molly D

customer_reviews.title: Chaep material and weak stitching
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality material and very weak stitching. I just got it, put it in my trunk and as I picked it up to move it the handle stitching broke. I will be returning it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aswad Khan

customer_reviews.title: Smells Really Awful
customer_reviews.text: This tote was unusable due to the noxious sulfurous odor of the synthetic material. I had to remove it from my my car after only a couple of hours due to the stink permeating the cabin. The odor still lingers in the car's trunk 2 weeks later. I thought just leaving the tote in my garage to air out for a few days might diminish the smell but now my garage smells like the tote, as well. Really no choice now but to throw it out. I found a collapsible plastic storage crate at a local Target that cost a few dollars less, is much sturdier and has a lid - so is actually a better option for hauling groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: The smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed an odor as soon as I took it out of the package. Aired it out for days to try and get rid of it. It’s toxic in the house, cannot even imagine how it would smell in my car. Avoid this thing, your nose will thank you. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Appliance Queen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed - sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Real poorly designed. The handles are so far apart that you cannot carry it. It is very heavy. The velcro they use has a death grip on your rug so you cannot move the organizer, which might be nice in theory... but in an SUV it is useless since it is either in the way or too far back. Pockets poorly designed. The lid (the reason I bought it) was a cheap piece of fabric. Does seem very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE ANIMAL POOP!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great, but the material smells like animal poop! My vehicle is brand new and of course still has the “new car” smell. I refuse to put this inside my vehicle because I don’t want to be stuck with a poop smelling vehicle. I have sprayed it down with febreeze, and left it outside in the extremely hot sun and NOTHING HELPS! IT SMELLS LIKE POOP! I don’t need organization that bad to have my vehicle smell like animal poop. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Davis

customer_reviews.title: I probably wouldn't reccomend to a friend...
customer_reviews.text: The box itself seems decently sturdy, I love that I was able to get everything into it that was in my hatch... the side pockets were a little tight and hard to use... the most disappointing part was that all of the fastner loops tore off... even the straps to buckle the sides down, broken... one of the plastic clips was broken during shipping and didn't look to be the manufacturers fault... It's still usable, but overall I was disappointed with the quality...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very solid organizer, mid size storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: The value for the price is great, the materials are strong and it has a lot of functionality for its size. I'm using it to store food/snacks plus rope, jumper cables, USB/micro/USBC cables with power bank, flashlight, umbrella etc. It isn't particularly large, but since it is to organize things that probably works better for smaller compartments otherwise you could simply pack things in your trunk as is. If anything you could buy two. But overall I really think this organizer is a great purchase for storing a variety of items that you might want to keep in the car for unplanned emergencies or spontaneous adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Muneno

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, and decent product.
customer_reviews.text: This holds so many things. However, it broke the day after I got it. Do not buy this. Not worth the money. It is in the process of being returned. Update: Since my one star review I have been in contact with their customer service representative. I have to say I am HIGHLY impressed with their product and employees. My return went swiftly and my replacement came quickly. The first trunk organizer must have just had a defect because It has been some time and the replacement trunk organizer is holding, and has yet to break. Overall, I would have to say I had a pleasant shopping experience. I would shop with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Santana

customer_reviews.title: Such a high quality trunk organizer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for an organizer for my 2018 Honda Fit to replace the ugly plastic bin I had been using. Honda wanted $78 for a similar organizer and I said 'NOPE'. This FORTEM organizer is almost identical to the fancy pants Honda one. It's so sturdy and the non-slip bottom is truly nonslip. There are neat pockets that make for easy storage/access to random things we all keep in our trunks. I highly recommend this organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Love

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic organizer
customer_reviews.text: We keep this organizer in the back seat and I love it! The sections are large enough to store blankets and toys for the kids. I love that there's lots of outer pockets, which we use to store wipes and various smaller items. And, the optional hook on it is handy for helping to keep it in place. We're really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just want to confirm the other positive reviews for this car organizer. It's definitely sturdy (not flimsy at all), can customize from 2 big sections vs 1 big sections + 2 smaller sections and has straps for keeping it from moving around. We do not need the straps as the velcro on the bottom is enough to keep it from moving around during a drive. - If you like to keep your belongings organized, this is a great choice at a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.author: EKC Cal

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRUNK ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these about a month ago and they work great. I tore one bc I tugged on them too hard, so it was my fault. I used the straps it comes with to hook on to, they fit inside of my ‘16 Jetta trunk perfectly. In my ‘16 4Runner I decided not to use the straps bc I have a trunk tray that gets in the way of the straps so they do not fit. If I did not have a trunk bed tray, it would fit perfectly though. It still works great without the straps. It makes my trunks look so organized and I no longer have random items tossing around in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Monique P

customer_reviews.title: It is good looking, well made and a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love this trunk organizer. It is good looking, well made and a perfect size. I have a 2013 Volkswagen Beetle and everything just slides around in the trunk area. This holds everything in place and does not slide. I'm very happy with the storage amount. I had several large size USPS boxes of "stuff" and this held everything with space to spare. The pockets are really handy and easy to get to and the inside compartments are very large. I don't have the measurements handy but I will update when I have them. If you have loose "stuff" in your trunk this is a great way to tidy it all up into a nice looking storage system.
customer_reviews.author: Earth2Frog

customer_reviews.title: Stinks long time
customer_reviews.text: Good design but makes your car smell bad. Hot weather or baking in the sun makes it worse. I bought several of these for myself and family. Everyone commented that it made their car stink, so they removed them. It's been weeks, and the things still make the whole car smell like unfinished MDF panels that you might pick up from a home store. I'm guessing it's formaldehyde off-gassing from the rigid panels in the organizer. If they fix the smell, then I'd rate it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Trunk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: The product holds good amount of stuff. The issue I have is that I have a truck and the strap hook they come with aren't long enough to hook to both sides but it stored all my stuff just fine but slides back and forth in the truck. I tried using the divider but they are flimsy at best and when I put things in each section the divider gets pushed since its Velcro and slides out of place. If you only want to use it for a small car and not use the divider I would consider it but for me I probably won't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my van
customer_reviews.text: Bought this organizer to hold variety of loose items in the van (reusable grocery bags, dog toys, backpack with kids toys, etc.). I have only used half of it since I didn't currently need the entire organizer and I like having a large section for hauling groceries, kids, dogs, etc. I can always open it up to full size using the additional bottom insert for more items should the need arise in the future. It seems to be made of a quality material and is very sturdy. I also like that you can use the inserts to reconfigure the organizer according to your personal needs. I can see this item lasting for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: CodyLamm

customer_reviews.title: a sturdy and foldable carry-all,super in my Rav.
customer_reviews.text: I always carry emergency items in my vehicle: battery cables, flashlight, gloves/umbrella/jacket/wipes, first-aid kit, etc. I used to drive to coast-to-coast, no longer do, but even now I like to be prepared. This carry-all even has handy outside pockets for maps, a notebook/pens, snacks. If I travel with kids I can haul their necessaries, diapers, toys, food, and it's all in one place. When I bring the dogs, I know where their leashes,food packets, pick-up plastic bags,etc are. And, I still have room for luggage, groceries, etc. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: NancyLee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trunk organizer. I drive a small SUV and always end up with a ton of random stuff in the back. This has helped me to keep all the stuff I like to leave in my car all the time (a flashlight, a blanket, yoga mat, etc) organized while I can still use my trunk for groceries and short term storage. Before I would always have to sort through everything in the back every time I got home which took way too much effort so I would leave more stuff in my car all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My trunk looks very organized
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Before this my trunk looked pretty bad. Now I have compartments for my dog stuff, for emergency (which fits even a big bottle of engine oil), and for my stuff like umbrellas. Everything looks nice and organized. It has something like sticks to the bottom which makes it very hard to move around in the car. I had to take it out one time and it took a lot of power which I like since I don’t want it moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to keep the new car as tidy as possible for as long as possible and this seems to fit that bill very well. The velcro on the bottom keeps it in place but I used one of the supplied tie straps just in case. Gives a good amount of storage space for things that would otherwise be rolling and sliding around in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer42

customer_reviews.title: Well made, mid size, organizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is well designed and well made. It is easy to expand, and easy to pack back into a small unit. I needed a way to store groceries to prevent bag contents from rolling around the back of my SUV. This midsize organizer is the right size, I can put large items outside it, while still fitting four grocery bags into the organizer. So far, I have not used the tie down straps because they haven’t been needed, the unit stays in one place as I drive.
customer_reviews.author: H. Oltman

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than it Looks
customer_reviews.text: This trunk organizer is MUCH smaller than it looks. It can hold barely 2 reusable bags of groceries. It's durable and sturdy, though--so I didn't return it. But it uses only about 1/4 of my CRV trunk space. For the price, I expected something bigger. I guess I should've measured first...
customer_reviews.author: InOrlando

customer_reviews.title: OMG LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I got this on prime day and oh my goodness!!! I love this so much. Goes in my X6 and makes grocery shopping, Target runs and just about anything else I pick up easy to carry. No more rolling around, finding my groceries scattered all over the back. Very sturdy and highly recommend it for cars and suvs. It does come with two books that keep it in plane but for me it's so sturdy that I didn't need them. I use the pockets for things I need to always keep with me. It's just great. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: zachus

customer_reviews.title: Beats the competition by far
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for road trips in my SUV. Typically I have to use my own straps to secure similar storage options, but this one had two straps with hook ends to keep it in place. Another thing that stood out to me was the sturdiness of the compartments and sidewalls yet it is completely collapsible in a matter of seconds. I highly recommend this item and its well constructed design.
customer_reviews.author: ClayC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: We were delighted with the trunk organizer. We just turned in a Honda Odyssey that had great space for groceries, etc for an SUV. After the deal we realized how are we going to transport all those bags of groceries. Went on Amazon and found this product. It folds into a totally flat compact configuration that has handles and looks like a flatten brief case. Yet when opened it provides good storage capability plus has straps to attach it to the hold downs in the rear cargo area. We are totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keller

customer_reviews.title: No more loose stuff rolling around my trunk!
customer_reviews.text: Trunks are usually large spaces with little organization afforded. Everything just kinda rolls around in there as you drive, and often makes thumping noises to boot. The stretchy net provided by the manufacturer is useless. Now my trunk is neat, and the adjustable straps keep all my tools and stuff from rolling around. The dividers and the side pockets are better quality than I’ve seen on any storage-organizing items too. Must-have for those that have OCD-ish tendencies like me ;)
customer_reviews.author: Page-Flipper

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one because it said there was a lid. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one because it said there was a lid. No lid. Returned it and ordered a second one. Again no lid, returned it as well.
customer_reviews.author: James J Ayres Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this and she can be a slob so I jumped at the opportunity. This keeps the trunk of the Santa Fe so cleaned up instead of crap rolling and bouncing around. The canvass is pretty strong and it seems to hold it's shape well. You can also pull out pieces if it isn't configured the way you want it. As nice that it has the hooks to keep it from sliding around. The velcro help but sometime I like the reassurance of those hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recycled Materials and lacking....
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Product is awful.. It is really bad quality recycled plastic. The smell is horrible. I know because I used to work in a CD Case manufacturing company and the quality of plastic ranges from Virgin to Recycled A, B, C and .. so forth in terms of grade for impurities... This .. yeah... if you dont really mind the smell then it is not bad. Durability: The overall box dimensions are pretty good. I would say the walls could have been thicker. The cover that it provides is super thin. It is practically useless. Even a shower cap is thicker. Bottom Line: I think you should look at other products...Not recommended for purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for ripping off the handle but great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much I bought 2. But when I tried to lift one of them out with groceries in it one of the handles ripped straight off. So now I just leave them velcro in place in the trunk and take my groceries out. Love the fact that everything stays in place and doesn’t fly around in my trunk due to my heave foot and crazy turns. Besides that. A great buy. Just be careful lifting it with items due to the bottom have great Velcro to attach to the carpet in the trunk of your car.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to store the miscellaneous items I keep my trunk of my four-door sedan. It’s sturdy and it will not budge as it has velcro on the bottom. Also has straps to anchor if needed. This is now a permanent fixture as it keeps everything in one place. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Breeze

customer_reviews.title: I love this trunk organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new trunk organizer! Perfect size, very sturdy, good amount of space in the two sections (and the ability to split one of them into two separate units), lots of pockets on the outside and clips to keep one or both sides collapsed and locked in place, the cables that hook onto the sides of the trunk make the unit stay perfectly in place in the center and not slide around. I love everything about it and highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for me! I bought an SUV 2 years ago after having owned a vehicle with a trunk. I missed my trunk. This product fits very well in the back of my SUV and there is still plenty of room for groceries and other purchases. I love the compartments and was able to fit all my many items for vehicle safety, etc. easily! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If you are transporting anything light weight, this may work well for you. Adding any substantial weight trying to move the box with its handles is not recommended. I had about 30-40 pounds of tools in it, and when I lifted it to slide it up in the bed of my truck both (not one, but both) handles ripped off. I was actually surprised how easy it was to pull off the handles and the tie down hooks - I must have superhuman strengh. For use in a car trunk with VERY LIGHT weight and care, this may serve your needs. You could also reinforce it with paper bags if you wanted to double the strength.
customer_reviews.author: William Russell

customer_reviews.title: Much much better product than the previous version...buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This newer version is 10 times better than the first version. The handle is much stronger and won’t break on the first use as the old version did. The walls are much sturdier the, so I don’t need to add boxes for rigidness as before. Use this in between front seats in our van. I was hesitant to order again from the same company since the older version failed so easily and the side walls were falling apart at the seams. I was going to use the old one in my other car, but just decided to trash it. The new one fits our needs, like all the side pockets and it holds it shape well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: VeryStableGenius

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing and keeping bags and items from rolling around.
customer_reviews.text: I deliver groceries so this was necessary for me. It’s great that it folds up so it can be put away easily when not in use. I uses it pretty much every day, so it gets a lot of use, but it is not as sturdy as I would like, over time. It’s great for just weekly trips to the store and it definitely helps keep bags organized and they don’t roll all over. I would get it again, but mine just takes a beating because of lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product and is large enough to hold lots of things. It can either be two large compartments or three compartments depending on how you place the dividers. It is great for me because I have a Service Dog and carry different things with me and it keeps the back of the car organized. Beside having a great product that has a great price, the Customer Service is outstanding. I had a few questions and the representative got back to me very quickly. I would definitely purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: egallagher

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: The product will go in the back of an SUV. It fit just fine and easily foldable when not in use. You don't want to place heavy objects (25 lbs. or more) in this bag and expect it not to tear before too long. Reasonably light weight objects can be carried without issue. For me it is more of an organizer than a tote bag. Keeping everything tidy and in place while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Dsos

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I am a Visiting Nurse and work out of my car. I carry supplies with me and find that, before long, the boxes take up so much room it becomes hard to maneuver anything. The "FORTEM Car Trunk Organizer" is the answer. It holds so much and you can move it easily too. I have bought 2 more and, with the new additions, will be rid of all the boxes in my car. This is a Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: rebba1960

customer_reviews.title: Groceries don’t slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: I’m always making grocery runs and I’ve had to great creative placing my groceries in the trunk so they don’t slip and slide. No more! This trunk organizer holds up pretty well. The picture I attached to this review shows how it looks in the back of my Subaru Outback. You may want to pick up two but the great thing is that they’re foldable. I no longer have to worry about a watermelon demolishing the rest of my food in the truck while I’m driving!
customer_reviews.author: Hiral

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and of great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like to travel, this fits my needs perfectly. From providing great storage on the passenger seat beside me for regular trips into town to providing storage for my clothes and misc stuff when camping. I sleep in my car and this organizer is perfect with it's separate compartments for clothes, toiletries, and other traveling needs. Besides the middle compartments that are adjustable, there's all kinds of cubbies all the sides and ends for misc things and can be seen and so don't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Cook

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trunk organizer! I ordered this for my son in law for Christmas. I love that it has a waterproof cover so he can use it in the back of his truck as well as inside. The disc to hold your cell phone is a great bonus too. This is a heavy duty organizer that will fold up flat when not in use. I love finding products with a lifetime warranty! This tells me that they stand behind their products and I'm sure my son in law will really like this too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This Trunk Organizer is of excellent quality & highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I own other brand organizers I bought here on Amazon and decided to get another one. Looking through the choices I found the RoadPal Trunk Organizer that appeared to be better than my current ones and at a lower price. I took advantage of their 5% discount for ordering 2 of them. I am completely satisfied I made a very good choice. The quality and sturdiness are better and the cover was a plus. From one who has used a few other trunk organizers, I highly recommend the RoadPro. I also received excellent service from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: R Santora

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has some options, like pockets on the side, and a removable insert, so that a variety of configurations are possible. I really like that the way to secure this item is NOT velcro on the bottom. I used to have one that was like that and it was way more trouble than it was worth. This one is secured in a better way that works well, or you don't have to use that at all. I like having the option.
customer_reviews.author: MileHIDi

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of stuff moving or rolling around the trunk and the cardboard box I was using was falling apart, bought this Trunk Organizer and was pleasantly surprised at the quality and sturdiness. The only negative was the bottom panels would slide under the main partition, not a deal breaker by any means. Took everything in the trunk and found a spot in the organizer. I will probably get another for the wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Ozone

customer_reviews.title: one of the best purchases ive made.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing. it fits perfectly in my hatchback. it is the PERFECT size for my usual grocery, or hunting supply shopping. it just holds the perfect amount for a single guy to buy his usual amount of stuff on his typical shopping outting, its great! if you put your groceries in it neatly, when you get home, you can just swoop them ALL up with 1 hand and close your trunk and open your door with the other. i love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, sturdy, but the smell is awful
customer_reviews.text: Product looks to be well put together. But, overwhelming smell exactly like the elephant house at the zoo. I should've read the other reviews with same problem.
customer_reviews.author: EN

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This trunk organizer is just what I was looking for. I was so tired of the things in my suv trunk moving all around. This is perfect. It’s super sturdy and well made. It’s just the right size so it fits a lot but doesn’t take up too much room in my trunk. It folds away flat if need be. It also has clips that can attach to your car (my car had these loops they could attach to, who knew) so it doesn’t slide around. It’s perfect and a great find.
customer_reviews.author: LB Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice cargo organizer.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot to choose from when it comes to cargo/trunk organizers. I did zero research on this and I just bought it randomly on a lightning deal. Is pretty useful, sturdy and has a nice selection of compartments. I would buy one again if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: johng

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: As a Field Service Engineer, I had used low profile storage bins to store parts in. They constantly slid around and when stacked would rattled. I measured the dimensions and this organizer would fit nicely into my available space. The depth of the organizer is equal to 2 low profile Rubbermaid bins stacked. The dividers made it easy for me to organize my trunk stock. If you need a nice smaller trunk organizer, this one may work well for you as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Well made sturdy storage bin
customer_reviews.text: This storage is easy to fold up and has pockets in the side for accessories like tire gauges and flares. It seems like it will last for a long time. I wish i paid more attention to the sizing because this storage box is massive. Good for the trunk of a car. I use it behind my seat in my pickup truck.
customer_reviews.author: gregb287

customer_reviews.title: Useful product and stellar customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The Fortem Car Trunk Organizer is just what I needed to keep things organized in the back of my SUV. Unfortunately, I had a seam open up on the bottom edge of my organizer (I suspect that it was stitched a bit too close to the edge of the material). I contacted customer service and they immediately sent me a replacement. Fortem's excellent customer service has made me a loyal customer for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: 21BC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy about this item! My trunk is cluttered free and organized. I was able to fit my car Jack(one u can buy at Walmart), jumping cables, tools that I have for when I change my oil, and other random items. It doesn't slide around in my trunk. I've tested by doing sharp turns, jamming on my brakes, and haven't heard anything banging in my basically empty space trunk. Going to buy another one soon for my relatives. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chrinecia Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Much neater and organized
customer_reviews.text: My trunk was a mess, items everywhere, this is compartmentalized and I am able to see what is in my trunk and have it at reach when I need. I keep almost everything in my trunk, extra umbrellas, water, pop, scarves, and hats. This has given me more room in my trunk for groceries and it looks so nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa S

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the trunk organizer but not in my car. I'm using it as a portable dresser during a remodel. When that is done I will then transition it to the trunk of my car. So far it seems pretty sturdy. I like the compartments and they work perfect for my current needs. The handles for carrying and hooks for securing in place come in handy so nothing goes flying off the seat of the car. A lid would be a great added feature. A smaller size that would fit on the floor behind my seat would also be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Gift - great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter for her new car. It arrived quickly and is nice and sturdy. It has velcro on the bottom to stick to the carpet, and it works very well! Kind of hard to move around, but it would keep things from sliding around. There are two sides, and then an extra divider in case you want to have additional sections.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Designed to handle some of life's little annoyances.
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy container holds groceries safely so that they never fall over or slide off the seat or spill contents or condensation onto the floor of your car. You can apply brakes without holding your breath and waiting for the sound of your groceries falling over. You can take corners at a normal speed, knowing your stuff is safely contained, regardless of how it is bagged (paper or plastic). The compartments will come in handy for any number of other things, too--gym bags, recyclables, etc. This is a useful, nicely designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sized Trunk Organizer with Great Features
customer_reviews.text: This trunk organizer is very sturdy and looks great. I like the clips which make it easy to halve the size or fold-up completely. Lots of outside pockets to hold small items and perfect size to hold groceries. My only minor complaints are that the strap hooks are much too short and the canvas fabric has a feint manure-like smell which goes away quickly when aired-out for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Overall good trunk organizer
customer_reviews.text: The materials feel sturdy and the organizer sticks in place. There are many pockets on the sides, which make it really practical to store small items. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had a milk crate with routine and emergency items that slid all around my cargo matted trunk area. I searched for an alternative that would stay put. Numerous truck units had Velcro. This one has rubber stop pads as well. Organizer stays in place even with my active driving tendencies. Exactly what I needed with versatile compartments. Highly recommend for quality, functionality and price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This product is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my trunk, I liked that it had the way to attach with hooks and velcro. However the product was packaged nicely, but I could tell it was very cheaply made when unfolded. -Seams look like the would rip over time -Seams where velcro was sewed to the product already looked to be pulling out -The hook attachments are too short, maybe 10 inches or so, if that was in the description I missed it that could be on me. Overall not worth the money, didn't mount in my car I'm returning the product for something else.
customer_reviews.author: BK_Review

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids toys for the park
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trunk organizer for my 2019 Honda Pilot EX-L because my kids "need" to carry their soccer balls, frisbees, footballs, etc in the car all the time just in case we see a park on our drives. This organizer fits everything properly without taking up too much space. Also, it has velcro on the bottom so it sticks to the carpet floor. It also doesn't slide around on the all-weather (rubber) mat that we have. Overall, I am very satisfied with this cargo area organizer and would recommend it for SUVs (might be a little big for sedans).
customer_reviews.author: vchand

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth a Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the item received. 1) it look like a used before organizer. 2) there is no securing strap, base hardened plate, only center divider. 3) stain at side. 4) cupboard support of the divider also break in pieces. I don't believe in return policy, that why I would rather throw away than return and I would not buy from this website any more as I lost confidence in your seller. see photo as per attached, is it a lousy item that is difference from the description stated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and portable
customer_reviews.text: I installed this organizer inside the trunk of my Jeep Cherokee, it fits perfectly allowing enough storage room for miscellaneous items while occupying about one third of the trunk space. It's sturdy enough to protect glass containers, has more than enough side pockets for tools and small items, the side handles provide portability and once folded it barely takes any space. It even comes with a nice cleaning cloth, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This is more than we had even hoped for
customer_reviews.text: My Wife and I got this to use in our small SUV to keep grocery bags and lighter items from rolling around. I have used it several times for shopping, and actually forego the reusable bags we used to use. I just use this as a shopping "bag". It folds up nicely for carrying into the grocery store, and then unfolds into one of two different configurations, depending on how much space you need. We will probably get another one for those big shopping trips!
customer_reviews.author: scott buie

customer_reviews.title: Make is solid slightly smaller than I imagined but overall great deal
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very solid. As far as the make goes it’s 100% legit and I have no doubt in my mind that this will last a long time. However I personally was expecting it to be bigger which is the only reason I gave it four instead of 5 stars. Other than that this was a great buy and I will still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AplusCmusick

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this organizer to keep my camping gear in. I keep my gear in the cargo area of my SUV and this solved the problem of it being scattered around. This is sturdy, has the dividers which really helps, and it holds most of my gear My camp stove, cookware, etc. all fits in it as well as numerous other items. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey's mom

customer_reviews.title: My trunk is happy now!
customer_reviews.text: Just receive the trunk organizer today, which looks good without significant defects. The organizer does help me a lot making my trunk clean and neat. I guess I just got too many stuffs, big and small, in the trunk. So now I am very pleased for having the organizer! I may provide more reviews in details after using it for a while. However, one thing I could tell right now what I dislike about the organizer is the handles, which does not feel comfortable enough when holding. I think it would be better if the handles could be wrapped with something like the one on a backpack making the hands feeling more comfortable when holding the organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Well made and keeps things from moving around
customer_reviews.text: I hike quite a bit and often have my own hiking gear as well as a friend's gear in the back of my car. I bough this trunk organizer to keep my gear all in one place. The organizer feels pretty sturdy and holds quite a bit. I can keep my hiking books in one compartment and my backpack and extra clothes in any other. Great to keep snow from my shoes off the backpack and clothes. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: tkmomhal

customer_reviews.title: Functional, versatile, great for neat freaks
customer_reviews.text: I picked up 2 of these for my new car....mainly to store auto detailing supplies, auto accessories, hauling laundry, and groceries/errand running. Product adapts well to different positions in auto with plenty of stability features (caribiners, straps, velcro) and compartments can be modified easily as needed for space/compartmentalization. No complaints of swaying from motion from driving Great gift for neat freaks and those of us who are obsessed with order
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple review. For the money, this is a good quality and sturdy organizer which I use in my trunk. It holds an ample amount of things and helped me clean up my trunk making it more functional space. I found it to be sturdy and once I opened it up, placed the bottom stiffeners and divider it held it's shape quite well while I loaded it. I would absolutely purchase this again and actually may grab a couple more for my RV Storage space after I measure the cubbies to make sure it fits.
customer_reviews.author: W. T. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: My trunk has kind of been a mess for a while. I tried to use just a regular plastic bin but it would constantly slide around and tip over and boom! the mess is back! lol This organizer is really nice. It's very sturdy and it doesn't seem to move around at all. I haven't used all the pockets yet but so far it holds my jumper cables, first aid kit and emergency supplies easily as well as some cleaning supplies I keep in the car. All in all, I've very happy with this product. and it actually doesn't take up much room in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Snowchsc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service. Replaced my old torn unit
customer_reviews.text: It was good until the bottom ripped apart. I had a sack of potatoes in there which weighed about 8 lbs. It lasted 4 months with moderate use. I really liked it but the bottom isn't durable. Edited: These people care about their customers even past the due date of return. I did not ask for assistance, they reached out and sent a new one. I was bummed out that my organizer broke down on me. So they immediately rectified the situation. I can't thank you guys enough. I really love this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: John Lumiib

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, useful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice trunk organizer with regards to build quality. It stays put in my Grand Cherokee and it is very useful to hold groceries, especially soda bottles which tend to slide around and destroy everything else in the trunk. It is particularly beneficial if you have kids and have to transport all the little things around that they need. I really like the outside pockets for smaller items. I liked it so much I bought another one for my wife's SUV.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Jeep Grand Cherokee cargo storage and the no slip velcro on bottom works as expected. Once the box is in place, it doesn't slide around. It's nice to be able to put grocery bags inside and I'm not going to have to hunt for items that have rolled out. I also, have gallons of milk doubled bag at grocery, and now they sit in storage box and I dont have to worry about them rolling around and leaking. Lid would have been nice since its listed in description, but you win some and lose some.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Chick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: The minute I got this organizer, I went out to my SUV and combined several bins, bags and loose items into one. I am very happy with it. It will hold my umbrellas, roadside emergency tools and equipment, and an assortment of miscellaneous tools, etc. I will say it's quite large, overall. But, it's also ideal to keep the back of my vehicle tidy. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Flying with my Fortem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to finally organize the back of my small airplane. I fly a Mooney M20E, and this fits perfectly into the cargo compartment. It is somewhat a tight fit as well, so things will not be moving around back there. The Mooney also has cargo clips on the floor, and the straps from the Fortem are useful to further to secure it in place. I know not what the company intended, but they should start marketing to the flying community!!
customer_reviews.author: James W. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Love these things!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the back of my crossover. Groceries don't slide around anymore. I do grocery pick up a lot and the staff loading the car never have problems fitting everything in. Makes my drive home nicer because I'm not distracted by sliding or rolling groceries.
customer_reviews.author: #1 DogMom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to set up, and helped organize the things in my trunk very well! It doesnt take up much space surprisingly; I still have so much more room in my trunk. Doesnt slide around either, and I have the trunk tray (plastic cover) on my 18 accord . Which usually causes things in my trunk to somewhat shift around while driving. Overall a great purchase! Looks and feels very sturdy also! Just what I was looking for. I will update if i encounter any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my truck washing stuff neatly together. The extendable hooks could be longer, but it wasnt a big deal since i have a rhino liner and it doesnt slide around the bed of my truck. Easy to pick up and move with side handles. It's loaded with well over 50lbs of crap and doesnt fold up, everything stays put. Its very sturdy for not being solid/hard material and is made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wimple

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Daughters new SUV
customer_reviews.text: I looked at 50 products and it came down to 3. Your product by far provided the best durability, the sectioned velcro areas were a plus as was the anti skid velcro on bottom. Your product also had the best positioned tie downs and provided exterior pouches for handy every day items. I'm so impressed that for all you offer the price was so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: david piteri

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Trunk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we have bought: One for each of our Jeeps. They fit nicely in both the 2018 Wrangler Sahara and the 2015 Renegade. They don't slide (we also bought Weather Tech mats) and stay upright although not fastened down in any way. The different compartments and pockets hold everything we need, from paper towels, 1st aid kit, rolled up blanket, a coupe rags and some recyle shopping bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy68

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all around !
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with this , and everyone that owns a vehicle and likes to keep the trunk organized or your groceries from flying around should buy this. Design is flawless, sturdy material, love the different combinations to suit your needs. Love it has gripper feet to stay put in the back of my SUV. When not needed or being used , I fold it up and lay it in my extra storage floor compartment . Very convenient to take out of vehicle and right into house. Aslong as it's not to heavy with objects. No complaints here !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer to keep your car neat and orderly!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is the perfect storage piece for the cargo area of a car or SUV! It has straps to hold it in place and there are 3 large storage sections. It is deep enough to store things like reusable cups/mugs for travel and can be reconfigured using the velcro that holds the divider in place. It is well made and roomy, but not so big that it takes up all of your cargo space. Still plenty of space for groceries, dogs, or any other miscellaneous things I find myself hauling on the regular.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Unusable pockets
customer_reviews.text: Love this except for the fact that the mesh side pockets are so tight they cant be used for anything other than papers. I planned to put a couple things in there since there is a few of them but they can not be used. Still a good organizer, but would’ve gotten a cheaper one had I known this.
customer_reviews.author: Amaris DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tote for trunk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy container to keep the car organized. I am a housecall veterinarian and have a lot of items I carry around with me. This container helps keep those items organized and separated. It is also sturdy enough that I can lift it when full of stuff to remove from the car when necessary without having to empty it out first. That is a huge plus making it simple to convert from business to personal travel when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Gussack

customer_reviews.title: Hooks break easily but durable overall
customer_reviews.text: The storage container is bigger than it seems when it arrives and folds easily down to a flat rectangle for easy storage. Only upsetting thing is the clips easily broke off if you wanted to keep it sturdy on any hooks you have in your trunk. Thankfully it has Velcro to stick to any carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Good organization
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for all my golf equipment, shoes gloves balls and the like. Keeps everything from rolling around my trunk. I like the outside pockets even though they are a little tight and the fact that you can adjust the inside is a nice bonus. I'm sure it will hold up because I won't be moving it around a lot. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer for our SUV
customer_reviews.text: Came as described for the storage area behind the 3rd row seats in our 2020 Kia Serento. Liked the velcro on the bottom plus tracks & straps to keep it from moving around. The pockets around the exterior were a plus. The only thing I could suggest is a zippered top to hide things from view.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Olson

customer_reviews.title: Neat and storage minded.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It has a compartments that are switchable. Has pouches to store, on its sides. I used the provided hooks to properly safe guard, to my car, and keep the goods inside from moving. This maybe for an suv only but i could be wrong on that beacause the hooks arent long enough to reach the sides for a sedan car. I have a 2019 honda passport.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for my SUV. I've used it on trips as well as for groceries. It's also great for pets supplies. The product came in the nick of time for my small weekend trip. The FORTEM doesn't move! bottom of the product has the rubber grips as well as velcro. It's sticks so well to the floor, I sometimes have a hard time moving it. The only Con I have is the inside and outside walls do, at times bow. Other than that, Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: KHen

customer_reviews.title: Overly large and well constructed product
customer_reviews.text: Of particular benefit to me, but not acknowledged within any of the questions or reviews I read, the size of this organizer can be reduced 50%. The clips and use of the seat connector make reducing the size possible and because of the organizer's robust size, this is helpful in reducing the footprint, (or space), taken by the product. Having only had this organizer for a couple of weeks, I cannot realistically attest to the actual sturdiness of the organizer, however, by appearance the material is significant and well stitched.
customer_reviews.author: st909

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 2019 Tacoma, I don't like putting groceries in my back seat so this makes it easier for me to put it in the bed and keep it in place. I have a tonneau cover for the bed so it's like having in the trunk of a car. Plus I was able to clip it down to the tie downs on the bed to keep it right close to the back lid.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Pomales

product_meta.title: FORTEM Car Trunk Organizer, Collapsible Storage, Non Slip Bottom, Securing Straps (Black)
feature_bullets: 🏎 DURABLE DESIGN – Built to last with reinforced base plates, sturdy side walls & strong carrying handles.
🏎 EASY TO USE – Unfold the organizer, slide in the hardened base plates, attach the divider, and fill with any items you'd like. Collapsible when not in use.
🏎 SECURE – Non-slip strips on the bottom and included securing straps prevent sliding whether the organizer is full or empty.
🏎 MANY USES – Organize a variety of things from Groceries to emergency tools or cleaning supplies while saving room in your trunk.
🏎 ONE YEAR WARRANTY - Have peace of mind knowing all Fortem products are covered for a full year!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars7,856 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
